query:
SELECT sc.id, sc.status, sc.createdAt, COUNT(sci.id) as item_count,
       SUM(CASE WHEN sci.divergence != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as divergent_count
FROM stageChecks sc
LEFT JOIN stageCheckItems sci ON sc.id = sci.stageCheckId
WHERE sc.customerOrderNumber = 'PED-005'
GROUP BY sc.id, sc.status, sc.createdAt
ORDER BY sc.id DESC;
command:

       SUM(CASE WHEN sci.divergence != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as divergent_count
FROM stageChecks sc
LEFT JOIN stageCheckItems sci ON sc.id = sci.stageCheckId
WHERE sc.customerOrderNumber = 'PED-005'
GROUP BY sc.id, sc.status, sc.createdAt
